1: A timeless refuge sustains all generations.
2: An eternal source sustains all creation through all ages.
3: I return and renew my life
4: Timeless perspective makes long years pass like a single moment.
5: Morning brings renewal and growth like fresh grass.
6: Embrace daily renewal and nurture growth with purpose.
7: Mercy brings peace and preserves life.
8: Light reveals everything, fostering honesty and growth.
9: Live each day purposefully, shaping years into a meaningful story.
10: Treasure limited time and live purposefully today.
11: Reverent awe cultivates wisdom and aligns life with great power.
12: We value our days and devote our hearts to wisdom.
13: Compassion swiftly returns, renewing care for those who serve.
14: Morning compassion fills hearts, and joy endures through every day.
15: Joy fills each day and year in full measure.
16: Great works shine to servants; children see enduring glory.
17: Favor rests on people; their work stands firm.
